ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I believe that my therapist is helping me
Notes: -3= Strongly feel it's not true; -2= Feel it's untrue; -1= Feel it's probably untrue or more untrue than true; 1= Feel it's probably true or more true than untrue; 2= Feel it's true; 3= Strongly feel it's true

ElementDescription: I believe that the treatment is helping me
Notes: -3= Strongly feel it's not true; -2= Feel it's untrue; -1= Feel it's probably untrue or more untrue than true; 1= Feel it's probably true or more true than untrue; 2= Feel it's true; 3= Strongly feel it's true

ElementDescription: I have obtained some new undestanding
Notes: -3= Strongly feel it's not true; -2= Feel it's untrue; -1= Feel it's probably untrue or more untrue than true; 1= Feel it's probably true or more true than untrue; 2= Feel it's true; 3= Strongly feel it's true

ElementDescription: I have been feeling better recently
Notes: -3= Strongly feel it's not true; -2= Feel it's untrue; -1= Feel it's probably untrue or more untrue than true; 1= Feel it's probably true or more true than untrue; 2= Feel it's true; 3= Strongly feel it's true

ElementDescription: I can already see that I will eventually wok out the problems I came to treatment for
Notes: -3= Strongly feel it's not true; -2= Feel it's untrue; -1= Feel it's probably untrue or more untrue than true; 1= Feel it's probably true or more true than untrue; 2= Feel it's true; 3= Strongly feel it's true

ElementDescription: I feel I can depend upon the psychiatrist.
I feel the psychiatrist understands me.
I feel the psychiatrist wants me to achieve my goals.
I feel I am working together with the psychiatrist in a joint effort
I believe we have similar ideas about the nature of my problems
I feel that I can understand myself and deal with myself on my own (that is, even if the therapist and I were no longer meeting for treatment appointments)
Notes: -3= Strongly feel it's not true; -2= Feel it's untrue; -1= Feel it's probably untrue or more untrue than true; 1= Feel it's probably true or more true than untrue; 2= Feel it's true; 3= Strongly feel it's true

ElementDescription: I feel improved in the following ways
I feel worse in the following ways
Estimate of improvement so far
Notes: 1= Not at all; 2= Slightly; 3= Moderately; 4= Much; 5= Very much

ElementDescription: HRQ Total score
